title: No Checkout Line
subtitle: No checkout lines for Brandlly users. Shop from your mobile with Brandlly, complete payment from the app and leave the store.

title: Social Distancing
subtitle: Brandlly is the best way to shop by maintaining social distance. No conduct with others. Keep distance and Stay safe.

title: Secure Mobile Payment
subtitle: Cashless, secure payment. Pay from your mobile using credit, debit, or visa card and mobile banking like bKash, rocket, nogod, etc.

title: Easy Refund Policy
subtitle: We have an easy refund policy due to the return of returnable products. Brandlly will take care of your return request.

title: Digital Invoice
subtitle: No invoice slip required, you will get a digital invoice for your order inside the mobile app. You can download it any time if required.

title: Save Time
subtitle: Save your time by skipping checkout lines and faster payment process. No checkout queue means no waste of time.

title: Warranty Card
subtitle: No warranty card safety headache. You can get it from Brandlly app anytime anywhere for your warranty support.

title: 24/7 Support
subtitle: We have a strong energetic support team ready 24/7 to serve you. You can call our support number or chat from mobile to get help.
